data.title: Impresa Pizzarotti & C. S.p.A.
data.meta_description:
THREE SPECIALIZED
 MANUFACTURING CENTERS 
Since the 1970s alongside the construction sector, we have developed the Precasting division, which operates in the field of prefabrication infrastructure and in the superstructure sector with the production of railway sleepers. There are three production centres.
The Ponte Taro (Parma) plant, where the management offices are also located and the staff
data.text:
Since the 1970s alongside the construction sector, we have developed the Precasting division, which operates in the field of prefabrication infrastructure and in the superstructure sector with the production of railway sleepers. There are three production centres.

The Ponte Taro (Parma) plant, where the management offices are also located and the staff of the technical office, covers the catchment area of the north and peninsula. Here, in addition to the construction of industrial prefabricated, beams are produced for the road and rail infrastructure sector. The Pontetaro pole is also equipped with a plant for the production of barriers noise abatement and a plant for the production of railway sleepers.

Inside the factory of Lucignano (Arezzo), in addition to the traditional production of industrial prefabricated, was recently started in parallel the production of prefabricated rings for the lining of a tunnel which represents a particularly strategic work for the railway network National: The high-speed train passing through Florence.

In the center of Melfi (Potenza) work Traversud S.r.l. (controlled by Impresa Pizzarotti & C. s.p.a.), highly specialized in the realization of crossbeams railway and traversons from exchange.

For us, customer satisfaction comes first.

Our sales staff and technicians work in teams to find the better solutions for every specific need. Order Management ensures that the operational phases are carried out in complete safety and better ways, coordinating our suppliers and site staff and making sure that the ideas of our customers turn into solid reality.

Traversud S.r.l. – Pizzarotti Lodovichi Superstructure

Company subject to the management and coordination of Impresa Pizzarotti & C. S.p.A.

Management and Offices: Via Anna Maria Adorni, 1 - 43121 Parma - Italy
